projects.title: Planet Quizzer
details: Developed a dynamic quiz platform integrated with a daily news feed to stimulate intellectual engagement.
Implemented an admin panel for quiz creation and management.
Optimized performance with lazy loading techniques.
Managed application state using Redux.
Utilized Azure Blob Storage for secure participant profile image and news poster storage.

projects.title: Epelle
details: Engineered an automated system for conducting spelling bee competitions, akin to the renowned event in Paris.
Streamlined competition scheduling and initiation through Epelle admin and CLI interfaces.
Enhanced user experience with lazy loading, significantly reducing website load times.
Integrated OpenAI API to generate challenging words for competitions.
Improved backend efficiency with aggregation for rapid I/O operations.
Built and utilized a custom npm package in the live project to enhance functionality.

projects.title: Team Decoder - Versions V4.5, V4.5.1, V4.5.2, V4.5.3
details: Resolved critical bugs in version 4.5 and introduced innovative features such as workload management, aggregated statistics, drag-and-drop functionality, and hotfixes for enhanced website performance.
Introduced FTE calculation in version 4.5.1, improving workload management.
Implemented workload feature in version 4.5.2, increasing team efficiency.
Launched Compare Mode in version 4.5.3, enabling better performance analysis.

projects.title: Launch Me Loud
details: Designed the frontend for an admin panel of a business building and monitoring application.
Architected the backend schema in MongoDB for robust data management in key areas.

projects.title: Boocademy - Pilot Project
details: Created an application that enables users to craft books using prompt generation via OpenAI API.
Facilitated book publishing in PDF format and implemented text-to-speech conversion using the Narakeet API, allowing users to download audio versions of their books.

projects.title: Sportojet - Admin Panel
details: Developed a comprehensive football team and coach management application.
Implemented a feedback system to guide player development across various skill aspects.
Introduced AI-driven detailed player comparisons, automated reporting, review generation, and video suggestions using Azure Blob Storage.
Integrated Whisper API for on-field analysis and utilized text refinement tools like options for enhanced communication.
